channel.title: NPC's Facing Backwards
channel.description:
Ok ive added a few NPC's shop keeper and assistant and there both facing backwards..... and not moving when walk type is 2 and range x1 y1 x2 y2 are all codeed....... Anyhelp im using a blank source
[code=java5]//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 520 3216 3416 0 3216 3415 3214 3416 2 Varrock Shop Keeper spawn = 521 3215 3416 0 3218 3413 3216 3214 2 Varrock Shop Assistant [/code]
